rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a private bathroom and walk-in closet, adhering to Vastu principles for prosperity and health.
Well-lit room designed in Scandinavian style with large windows for ample natural light, enhancing the luxury experience.
Comfortable bedroom with access to a shared bathroom and a balcony facing east for morning sunlight.
Well-appointed guest room designed in Scandinavian minimalist style, with direct access to the front garden.
A cozy and elegant library with a large glass door leading to an inner courtyard for tranquil reading spots.

openings.description: Modern kitchen equipped with luxury appliances and ample storage space, placed in the South-Eastern corner to follow Vastu.
Open and spacious living room with large windows for natural light, designed in Scandinavian style with luxury finishings.
Elegant dining area connected to the kitchen and living space, strategically placed for family gatherings.
